forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow late. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain or freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low near 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers mixed after midnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
